description: {"blocks":[{"key":"qq0b","text":"A list of all protocols used, from Zymo Research with slight modification. Additionally, protocols for measurement of purity and concentration are listed as well. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"equsu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bo6he","text":"D6010 is used when there are only a handful of samples and we use tubes, with the corresponding clean and concentrate protocol being D4013 . D4302, D4306, D4308 is the protocol used when there are a large number of samples and we are using a plate, and the corresponding clean and concentrate protocol is D4066. For bottoms of cores that have less DNA, protocol D6110 has been effective. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":140,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
keywords: DNA,Extraction,Zymo research,zymoresearch,D6010,D4013,D4066,D6110,clean,clean and concentrate,concentration,purity,nanodrop,qubit,D4302,D4306, D4308, plate protocol, epMotion, eppendorf, tubes

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"e9ei2","text":"The filter may be discarded and the eluted DNA is now in the 1.5mL microcentrifuge tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Measuring Concentration and Purity with Nanodrop
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"b8lpb","text":"Select dsDNA and follow the prompts from the Nanodrop.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: DNA Extraction Protocol by Hand: Quick DNA Fecal/Soil Microbe Miniprep Kit D6010
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"cui5e","text":"Print Labels for 1.5mL tubes (“Monet, Sample ID, Core Location, DNA\")","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: DNA Extraction Protocol by Hand: Quick DNA Fecal/Soil Microbe Miniprep Kit D6010
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"ah9ja","text":"Measure 200mg of soil in ZR Bashing Bead Lysis Tube, do not exceed 200mg as to not overwhelm the tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: DNA Extraction Protocol by Hand: Quick DNA Fecal/Soil Microbe Miniprep Kit D6010
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"iiup","text":"Remove all the lids and add 750uL of ZymoBIOMICS lysis solution","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: DNA Extraction Protocol by Hand: Quick DNA Fecal/Soil Microbe Miniprep Kit D6010
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"ds72k","text":"Recap and put in a bead beater for 10 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: DNA Extraction Protocol by Hand: Quick DNA Fecal/Soil Microbe Miniprep Kit D6010
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6b2k9","text":"Centrifuge ZR Bashing Bead Lysis Tube in a microcentrifuge at 16,000 x g for 1 minute","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: DNA Extraction Protocol by Hand: Quick DNA Fecal/Soil Microbe Miniprep Kit D6010
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"55mhr","text":"Pipette 350uL of the solution in Zymo-Spin III-F filter, placed in a collection tube. Pipette the remaining solution into another Zymo-Spin III-F filter with collection tube. Now you have two sets of DNA from one original sample that can be combined later","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: DNA Extraction Protocol by Hand: Quick DNA Fecal/Soil Microbe Miniprep Kit D6010
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"2fd4q","text":"Centrifuge at 8,000 x g for one minute (If you get a pellet, pipette supernatant to a fresh tube)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: DNA Extraction Protocol by Hand: Quick DNA Fecal/Soil Microbe Miniprep Kit D6010
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"42am6","text":"Discard the filter","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: DNA Extraction Protocol by Hand: Quick DNA Fecal/Soil Microbe Miniprep Kit D6010
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4me6","text":"Add 800uL of Genomic Lysis Buffer and 400uL of ethanol to the filtrate. Mix well","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: DNA Extraction Protocol by Hand: Quick DNA Fecal/Soil Microbe Miniprep Kit D6010
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"d8k5o","text":"Transfer the solution to a Zymo-Spin IICR filter and collection tube. (Note: You cannot fit the entire solution in the filter, you will need to do the following steps at least twice:)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: DNA Extraction Protocol by Hand: Quick DNA Fecal/Soil Microbe Miniprep Kit D6010
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"baub3","text":"Centrifuge at 10,000 x g for 1 minute. Discard flow through","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: DNA Extraction Protocol by Hand: Quick DNA Fecal/Soil Microbe Miniprep Kit D6010
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"7b2hm","text":"Add the rest of the solution from step 9 and repeat step 11","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: DNA Extraction Protocol by Hand: Quick DNA Fecal/Soil Microbe Miniprep Kit D6010
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6gvpq","text":"Put the filter in a new collection tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: DNA Extraction Protocol by Hand: Quick DNA Fecal/Soil Microbe Miniprep Kit D6010
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"mo6q","text":"Add 200uL of DNA pre-wash buffer to the Zymo-Spin IICR Column and centrifuge at 10,000 x g for 1 minute","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: DNA Extraction Protocol by Hand: Quick DNA Fecal/Soil Microbe Miniprep Kit D6010
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"f0j2i","text":"Add 500uL of g-DNA wash buffer to the Zymo-Spin IICR Column","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: DNA Extraction Protocol by Hand: Quick DNA Fecal/Soil Microbe Miniprep Kit D6010
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"2hcue","text":"Centrifuge at 10,000 x g for 1 minute. Discard flow through","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: DNA Extraction Protocol by Hand: Quick DNA Fecal/Soil Microbe Miniprep Kit D6010
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"2nhm5","text":"Repeat step 16","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: DNA Extraction Protocol by Hand: Quick DNA Fecal/Soil Microbe Miniprep Kit D6010
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"129ld","text":"Get a new collection tube for the filter and change gloves","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: DNA Extraction Protocol by Hand: Quick DNA Fecal/Soil Microbe Miniprep Kit D6010
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"bb3mn","text":"Add 100uL of elution buffer to the filter and let incubate at room temperature for 1 minute","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: DNA Extraction Protocol by Hand: Quick DNA Fecal/Soil Microbe Miniprep Kit D6010
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"3ran1","text":"Centrifuge at 10,000 x g for 1 minute","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: DNA Extraction Protocol by Hand: Quick DNA Fecal/Soil Microbe Miniprep Kit D6010
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"brh4p","text":"Add 600uL of prep solution to a new III-HRC filter with a collection tube and let incubate for 3 minutes. Then centrifuge at 8000 x g for 3 minutes. Discard flow through.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: DNA Extraction Protocol by Hand: Quick DNA Fecal/Soil Microbe Miniprep Kit D6010
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"67kb9","text":"Put the III-HRC filter into a 1.5mL microcentrifuge tube with cap.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: DNA Extraction Protocol by Hand: Quick DNA Fecal/Soil Microbe Miniprep Kit D6010
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"9lggc","text":"Discard the filter from step 19 and pipette the eluted DNA to the prepared III-HRC filter","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"675r9","text":"Centrifuge at 16,000 x g for 3 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Measuring Concentration and Purity with Nanodrop
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"ar5ic","text":"Use 2uL of nuclease free water as the blank before you begin measuring samples","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Measuring Concentration and Purity with Nanodrop
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"8qrgq","text":"Once the blank has been calibrated use 2uL of sample to measure the concentration and purity","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Measuring Concentration and Purity with Qubit
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"al35r","text":"Set up two standards, (Note: keep buffer away from the light as much as possible)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9ihsb","text":"Measure 190uL of buffer and 10uL of standard in Qubit measurement tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"q7ca","text":"Vortex the tubes briefly","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"136uk","text":"Incubate in the dark for two minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a60c9","text":"Measure 198uL of buffer and 2uL of sample, vortex briefly and incubate in the dark for two minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"et424","text":"Follow Qubit prompts and measure standards and then sample","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: DNA Clean and Concentrater-5 Protocol D4013
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"eo8fg","text":"Add 200uL of DNA Binding Buffer to the eluted DNA","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: DNA Clean and Concentrater-5 Protocol D4013
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4k2sd","text":"Transfer the mixture to a Zymo-Spin column in a collection tube. If you have multiple sets of DNA, combine them in this step","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: DNA Clean and Concentrater-5 Protocol D4013
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"7ctkr","text":"Centrifuge for 30 seconds at 16000 x g and discard flow through","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: DNA Clean and Concentrater-5 Protocol D4013
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"enbu5","text":"Add 200uL of DNA Wash Buffer centrifuge for 30 seconds at 16000 x g then repeat this step again.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: DNA Clean and Concentrater-5 Protocol D4013
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"as94a","text":"Put the filter in a 1.5mL microcentrifuge tube with cap","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: DNA Clean and Concentrater-5 Protocol D4013
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"2et84","text":"Add 100uL of DNA Elution Buffer to the filter, let incubate for 1 minute at room temperature","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: DNA Clean and Concentrater-5 Protocol D4013
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"7460a","text":"Centrifuge at 16000 x g for 1 minute. Eluted DNA is now ready for use","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: DNA Extraction 96 Plate (With Eppendorf epMotion) D4302, D4306, D4308
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"541bc","text":"Print Labels for 1.5mL tubes (“Monet, Sample ID, Core Location, DNA) place on ZR BashingBead Lysis Rack","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: DNA Extraction 96 Plate (With Eppendorf epMotion) D4302, D4306, D4308
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"39ls7","text":"Measure 200mg of soil in ZR Bashing Bead Lysis Tube, do not exceed 200mg as to not overwhelm the tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: DNA Extraction 96 Plate (With Eppendorf epMotion) D4302, D4306, D4308
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"c3j09","text":"Remove all the lids and add 750uL of ZymoBIOMICS lysis solution","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: DNA Extraction 96 Plate (With Eppendorf epMotion) D4302, D4306, D4308
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"7ijab","text":"Recap and put in a bead beater for 10 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: DNA Extraction 96 Plate (With Eppendorf epMotion) D4302, D4306, D4308
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"2svcj","text":"Centrifuge ZR Bashing Bead Lysis Tube in a microcentrifuge at 16000 x g for 1 minute","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: DNA Extraction 96 Plate (With Eppendorf epMotion) D4302, D4306, D4308
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"bua2r","text":"Add 600uL of ZymoBIOMICS MagBinding Buffer and 25uL of the beads to 3 96 well plates. Mix well","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: DNA Extraction 96 Plate (With Eppendorf epMotion) D4302, D4306, D4308
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"41sqe","text":"Add 200uL of supernatant to each 96 well plate so you have 3 sets of the sample","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: DNA Extraction 96 Plate (With Eppendorf epMotion) D4302, D4306, D4308
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"1bddm","text":"Load plate in the Eppendorf epMotion and begin protocol: (Note: since there are three plates, epMotion can only one run one a day, so this will take three days to complete)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: ZR-96 Genomic DNA Clean and Concentrator-5 Kit Protocol D4066
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"8mvil","text":"Centrifuge plates at 3486 x g for 3 minutes before you start","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: ZR-96 Genomic DNA Clean and Concentrator-5 Kit Protocol D4066
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"7jkoi","text":"Add 200uL of ChIP DNA Binding Buffer to each volume of DNA sample","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: ZR-96 Genomic DNA Clean and Concentrator-5 Kit Protocol D4066
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"djq9s","text":"Mix well and transfer mixtures to the provided Zymo-Spin I-96-XL Plate mounted on a collection plate and centrifuge for 5 minutes at 3486 x g","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: ZR-96 Genomic DNA Clean and Concentrator-5 Kit Protocol D4066
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"10dfi","text":"Repeat step 49 with duplicate samples","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: ZR-96 Genomic DNA Clean and Concentrator-5 Kit Protocol D4066
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"eq2vn","text":"Add 200uL of DNA Wash Buffer and centrifuge for 5 minutes at 3486 x g","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: ZR-96 Genomic DNA Clean and Concentrator-5 Kit Protocol D4066
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"balnk","text":"Centrifuge again to ensure all solution has filtered through to the collection plate","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: ZR-96 Genomic DNA Clean and Concentrator-5 Kit Protocol D4066
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"i137","text":"Put Zymo-Spin I-96-XL Plate on an Elution Plate and add 50uL of Elution Buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: ZR-96 Genomic DNA Clean and Concentrator-5 Kit Protocol D4066
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"a130b","text":"Centrifuge for 5 minutes at 3486 x g to elute the DNA.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: 50mL Tube DNA Extraction Protocol D6110
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"br978","text":"Print Labels for 50mL tubes (“Monet, Sample ID, Core Location, DNA). Add 2.5-5g of soil to the bead/filter chamber of a ZR BashingBead Lysis/Filtration Tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: 50mL Tube DNA Extraction Protocol D6110
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"963mu","text":"Add 6mL of BashingBead buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: 50mL Tube DNA Extraction Protocol D6110
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4i387","text":"Shake on bead beater for ten minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: 50mL Tube DNA Extraction Protocol D6110
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"eglad","text":"Centrifuge at 3486 x g for five minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: 50mL Tube DNA Extraction Protocol D6110
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"843o6","text":"Transfer the supernatant to a clean 50mL tube, there is likely a pellet","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: 50mL Tube DNA Extraction Protocol D6110
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"7ih2v","text":"Add 18mL of Genomic Lysis Buffer to supernatant and mix well","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: 50mL Tube DNA Extraction Protocol D6110
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"865rt","text":"Filter entire mixture using Zymo-Spin V-E Column / Zymo-Midi Filter with a new 50mL tube, Centrifuge at 2000 x g for five minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: 50mL Tube DNA Extraction Protocol D6110
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"104g2","text":"Repeat step 61, because the mixture won’t all fit the first time","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: 50mL Tube DNA Extraction Protocol D6110
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"3vb6m","text":"Centrifuge at 2000 x g for five minutes once more to ensure the solution has entirely filtered","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: 50mL Tube DNA Extraction Protocol D6110
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"2gq8e","text":"Transfer the Zymo-Spin V-E Column to a collection tube and spin at 10000 x g for 1 minute in a microcentrifuge. (The filter disconnects from the column)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: 50mL Tube DNA Extraction Protocol D6110
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"8s5tm","text":"Add 300uL of DNA Pre-Wash Buffer to the filter and spin at 10000 x g for 1 minute and discard flow through","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: 50mL Tube DNA Extraction Protocol D6110
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"f5ki5","text":"Add 400uL of g-DNA wash Buffer to the column and centrifuge at 10000 x g for 1 minute, discard flow through","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: 50mL Tube DNA Extraction Protocol D6110
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"65h8","text":"Repeat step 66","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: 50mL Tube DNA Extraction Protocol D6110
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4itrs","text":"Place Zymo-Spin III-HRC in a clean collection tube and add 600uL of prep solution. Let incubate for 3 minutes then centrifuge at 8000 x g for 3 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: 50mL Tube DNA Extraction Protocol D6110
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"dpfu3","text":"Transfer the Zymo-Spin III-HRC filter to a 1.5mL microcentrifuge tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: 50mL Tube DNA Extraction Protocol D6110
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"1ko3g","text":"Transfer the Zymo-Spin V-E Column to a clean collection tube and add 150uL of Elution Buffer directly to the column matrix, let incubate for a minute and then centrifuge at 10000 x g for 1 minute","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: 50mL Tube DNA Extraction Protocol D6110
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"8r5ml","text":"Transfer the eluted DNA to the prepared III-HRC filter and centrifuge at 16000 x g for 3 minutes. Eluted DNA is ready for use. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: DNA Extraction 96 Plate (With Eppendorf epMotion) D4302, D4306, D4308
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5dqq","text":"a.       Transfer the 96-well block to a magnetic stand until beads pellet, then aspirate and discard the supernatant. Remove the 96-Well Block from the magnetic stand","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: DNA Extraction 96 Plate (With Eppendorf epMotion) D4302, D4306, D4308
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6tvki","text":"b.       Dispense 500 µl of ZymoBIOMICS™ MagBinding Buffer and mix well by pipette","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: DNA Extraction 96 Plate (With Eppendorf epMotion) D4302, D4306, D4308
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4e84v","text":"c.       Transfer the 96-well block to a magnetic stand until beads pellet, then aspirate and discard the supernatant. Remove the 96-Well Block from the magnetic stand.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: DNA Extraction 96 Plate (With Eppendorf epMotion) D4302, D4306, D4308
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"a28pc","text":"d.       Dispense 500 µl of ZymoBIOMICS™ MagWash 1 and mix well by pipette","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: DNA Extraction 96 Plate (With Eppendorf epMotion) D4302, D4306, D4308
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"9t9kt","text":"e.       Transfer the 96-well block to a magnetic stand until beads pellet, then aspirate and discard the supernatant. Remove the 96-Well Block from the magnetic stand.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: DNA Extraction 96 Plate (With Eppendorf epMotion) D4302, D4306, D4308
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"81qpi","text":"f.        Dispense 900 µl ZymoBIOMICS™ MagWash 2 and mix well by pipette or shaker plate for 1 minute.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: DNA Extraction 96 Plate (With Eppendorf epMotion) D4302, D4306, D4308
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"59jdt","text":"g.       Transfer the deep-well block to a magnetic stand until beads pellet, then aspirate and discard the supernatant. Remove the 96-Well Block from the magnetic stand.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: DNA Extraction 96 Plate (With Eppendorf epMotion) D4302, D4306, D4308
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4tddf","text":"h.       Repeat the wash (Steps 46.6-46.7).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: DNA Extraction 96 Plate (With Eppendorf epMotion) D4302, D4306, D4308
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"8803f","text":"i.         Transfer the 96-Well Block onto a heating element (55°C) until beads dry (approximately 30 minutes).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: DNA Extraction 96 Plate (With Eppendorf epMotion) D4302, D4306, D4308
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"9rg7h","text":"j.         Heat again at 30°C for 30 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: DNA Extraction 96 Plate (With Eppendorf epMotion) D4302, D4306, D4308
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"9ttl0","text":"k.       Dispense 50 μl of ZymoBIOMICS™ DNase/RNase Free Water to each well and re-suspend beads. Mix the beads well for 10 minutes and then transfer the plate onto the magnetic stand for 2-3 minutes until the beads pellet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: DNA Extraction 96 Plate (With Eppendorf epMotion) D4302, D4306, D4308
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"abpok","text":"l.         Transfer the supernatant (containing the eluted DNA) to a clean elution plate or tube. The eluted DNA can be used immediately for molecular based applications or stored ≤ -20ºC for future use.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: DNA Extraction
